hero.title: PicGo
hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Image Upload & Management Tool
hero.description: Seamlessly upload images to multiple cloud storage services with a beautiful, cross-platform interface. Supports 20+ image hosting services with powerful plugin system.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for efficient image management

multiPicbed.title: Multi-Picbed Support
multiPicbed.description: Support for 20+ image hosting services including GitHub, SMMS, Aliyun OSS, Qiniu, Tencent COS, and more. Switch between different picbeds seamlessly.

pluginSystem.title: Plugin System
pluginSystem.description: Extend PicGo's functionality with powerful plugins. From custom uploaders to advanced image processing, the possibilities are endless.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Available on macOS, Windows, and Linux with native performance and consistent user experience across all platforms.

clipboardUpload.title: Clipboard Upload
clipboardUpload.description: Upload images directly from your clipboard with a single shortcut. Perfect for quick screenshots and captures.

batchUpload.title: Batch Operations
batchUpload.description: Upload multiple images at once, rename files automatically, and manage your uploads efficiently with batch operations.

galleryManagement.title: Gallery Management
galleryManagement.description: Keep track of all your uploaded images with a built-in gallery. Search, preview, and manage your image history with ease.

plugins.title: Plugin Ecosystem
plugins.subtitle: Extend PicGo beyond imagination
plugins.description: With our powerful plugin system, you can add new image hosting services, customize upload workflows, integrate with other tools, and much more.

supportedServices.title: Supported Services
supportedServices.subtitle: Connect with your favorite image hosting services

footer.copyright: © 2017-2024 PicGo. Open source project maintained by
footer.author: Molunerfinn
